document_data.name: Imaskari languages
document_data.mainbody: The '''Imaskari languages''' were a small family of languages that shared a history in the ancient empire of [[Imaskar]].
document_data.Language Groups:
According to scholars, the following languages and language groups belonged to the Imaskari language family:
* [[Ancient Imask languages]]
* Imaskari ([[Roushoum]])
* [[Gurri]]
* [[Durpari language|Durpari]]
* [[Durpari-Shaartan Patois]]
* [[Lantanese language|Lantanna]]
